title: Watashi to Kanojo no Synesthesia - Novel Updates
author: Chokingyomaru   ちょきんぎょ。
description:
A heartwarming short story of 2 girls’ codependency as they both struggle to cope with synesthesia.

note: synesthesia is the condition whereby stimulating one sense organ triggers a response in another sense organ as well i.e. smelling something and a colour comes to mind.)>
